updateApp.description: Check your app version and look for updates. When an update is available, you can install it from here.
updateApp.tauriComingSoon: Updates for the desktop app will be available soon. You will be notified when a new version is ready.
updateApp.swDisabledMessage: The app will update when you refresh the page.
updateApp.checkError: Error checking for updates. Try again

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.modeDescription: Choose light, dark, or automatic mode.
appearance.colorThemeDescription: Select a color theme. Each theme has light and dark variants.

languageAndRegion.title: Language & region
languageAndRegion.description: Configure your language and regional settings.
languageAndRegion.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language. Changes will be applied immediately.
languageAndRegion.regionDescription: Select your timezone. Dates throughout the app will adjust to this timezone.

errorReporting.label: Error reporting
errorReporting.statusConfigured: Configured. You can turn it off below.
errorReporting.description: Allow this app to send error reports to help fix issues.

developerFeatures.label: Show features for developers
developerFeatures.description: Enable developer tools and settings in the settings menu.

reset.title: Reset All Data
reset.warning: This will permanently delete all your settings, preferences, and other app data. This action cannot be undone.

toast.title: Reset All Data?
toast.description: This will permanently delete all your settings, preferences, and other app data. This action cannot be undone.

success.title: Data Reset
success.description: All app data has been reset successfully.

dataPrivacy.title: Data Privacy
dataPrivacy.description: Manage your data privacy settings and cookie preferences.

noCookiesConfigured.title: Cookie Usage
noCookiesConfigured.description: This application only uses strictly essential cookies that are necessary for the application to function properly. These cookies are accepted by default and cannot be disabled.
noCookiesConfigured.info: No optional cookies are configured for this application.

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.descriptionConsented: You have made a choice about cookies. Reset to be asked again right away.
cookieConsent.descriptionNotConsented: You have not yet made a choice about cookies.
cookieConsent.statusAcceptedAll: You have accepted all cookies. This helps us provide you with the best experience.
cookieConsent.statusRejectedAll: You have rejected non-essential cookies. Only strictly necessary cookies are active.
cookieConsent.statusCustom: You have customized your cookie preferences. Some cookies are enabled based on your choices.

dialog.title: Reset Cookie Consent?
dialog.description: This will clear your cookie preferences. You will be asked to accept or reject cookies on your next visit.

toast.title: Cookie Consent Reset
toast.description: You will be asked about cookies on your next visit.

resetData.title: Reset All Data
resetData.description: This will permanently delete all your settings and app data. This action cannot be undone.

toast.title: Reset All Data?
toast.description: This will permanently delete all your settings, preferences, and other app data. This action cannot be undone.

success.title: Data Reset
success.description: All app data has been reset successfully.

caching.title: Service Worker
caching.description: A service worker runs in the background and can cache the app for faster loading and offline use. When enabled, it stores files locally so the app loads quickly and works without a connection. You can enable or disable it below.

developmentMode.title: Development Mode
developmentMode.description: App caching is only available in production builds. Build your app with 'shellui build' to enable service worker caching.

enabled.title: Enable service worker
enabled.descriptionEnabled: The service worker is enabled. It caches the app for faster loading and offline access.
enabled.descriptionDisabled: The service worker is disabled. The app will not be cached and will always load from the network.

status.title: Service worker status
status.fileNotFoundDescription: The service worker file could not be found. Caching is not available. This may be a development server issue.

update.title: Update Available
update.description: A new version of the app is available. Install it now to get the latest features and improvements.

updateInstalling.title: Installing Update
updateInstalling.description: The new version is being installed. The page will reload shortly.

updateError.title: Update Failed
updateError.description: Failed to install the update. Please try again later.

reset.title: Reset to Latest Version
reset.description: Clear all cached files and reload the app to get the latest version from the server.

resetSuccess.title: Reset Successful
resetSuccess.description: All cached files have been cleared. The app will reload with the latest version.

resetError.title: Reset Failed
resetError.description: Failed to clear cached files. Please try again later.

navigation.title: Navigate to
navigation.description: Send a navigation request to the root app. This closes any open drawer or modal and navigates to the selected item.
navigation.empty: No navigation items available (open from root to see items).

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Switch between sidebar layout and windows (taskbar) layout. This overrides the app config for this session.

logging.title: Logging
logging.description: Enable or disable logging for specific namespaces. This helps you control which parts of ShellUI output debug information.

shellsdk.label: Show ShellSDK logs
shellsdk.description: Enable logging for ShellUI SDK operations

shellcore.label: Show ShellCore logs
shellcore.description: Enable logging for ShellUI Core operations

error.title: Error
error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: This action may have unintended consequences

info.title: Information
info.description: Here's some useful information for you

default.title: Default Toast
default.description: This is a default toast notification

loading.title: Loading...
loading.description: Please wait while we process your request

uploadComplete.title: Upload Complete!
uploadComplete.description: Your file has been uploaded successfully

withAction.title: Toast with Action
withAction.description: This toast has an action button

persistent.title: Persistent Toast
persistent.description: This toast will stay until dismissed (10 seconds)

ok.title: Simple OK Dialog
ok.description: This is a simple dialog with just an OK button.

okCancel.title: OK Cancel Dialog
okCancel.description: This dialog has both OK and Cancel buttons.

delete.title: Delete Confirmation
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

confirm.title: Confirm Action
confirm.description: Do you want to proceed with this action?

onlyCancel.title: Only Cancel Dialog
onlyCancel.description: This dialog only has a Cancel button.

modalTesting.title: Modal Testing
modalTesting.description: Opens the settings in a modal. Close with the × button or by clicking outside.
